column3: str
O-Oh, you're here already! I was just taking an innocent look around. Promise.
I think you're right about a cavern! If we had the right tools, we could break through this rock and see what's inside. Could be anything, right? Gold, riches...emergency exits...
The mammet-sized spelunking tools recipe has been added to the sanctuary crafting log. Deliver this set of tools to the determined digger once it has been crafted.
Once you've prepared the right tools, give them to me and we'll see what's in this cavern. Maybe it's a secret way off the island! Ha ha! That was a joke!
...A-Are you giving these to me? Is it really okay to find out what lies beyond this wall?

Open the cavern wall?
<UIForeground>F201FA</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FB</UIGlow>※Once the cavern has been opened, the area cannot be returned to its previous state.<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
Open sesame!
On second thought...
Thank you... Oh, thank you, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>! We'll dig like no mammet has ever dug before. For the future. For liberty!
B-But don't you care about the gold!? The riches!? Th-They could be down there, you know! I'm only trying to help further your profits!
There was a cavern after all. ...A fully sealed cavern with sturdy and impenetrable walls.

I-I'm sure you'll find lots of useful things in here! Things we can collect for you and make for you and sell for you. Day in and day out. ...E-Excuse me, I need a moment to myself. Enjoy your new cavern, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>miss<Else/>sir</If>.
The crumbling caverns have been added as a location for granary foraging expeditions.

<Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>! I have wonderful news. I was just performing a thorough investigation of the cave for possible exits─er, <Emphasis>rocks</Emphasis>, when what should I spy but spriggans scuttling about with crystals the size of me!
I thought I knew every nook and cranny of this island, but such a discovery is proof of hidden possibility...
There must be another cavern somewhere! A passageway that leads far, <Emphasis>far</Emphasis> away from here and, er...to a vast deposit of crystals! That's right! Further riches might yet be yours!
Have a look around and tell me if anything seems suspicious.
A hollow wall!? I-I mean, yes...definitely worthy of further inspection.
Hmm... The rock in this cavern is quite thick. We'll need better tools if we have any hope of bursting through that wall to the, er...<Emphasis>crystals</Emphasis> that lie beyond.
Come and find me once you've finished making the tools. I'll be waiting here. Forever, if need be.
The splendiferous mammet-sized spelunking tools recipe has been added to the sanctuary crafting log. Deliver this set of tools to the determined digger once it has been crafted.
Are the tools finished yet? ...How about now?
Perfect... These tools are <Emphasis>perfect</Emphasis>! Just say the word, and we'll topple this rock before you can shout, “For liberty!”

Open the inner cavern wall?
<UIForeground>F201FA</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FB</UIGlow>※Once the inner cavern has been opened, the area cannot be returned to its previous state.<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
Tear it down!
Perhaps later...
Oh I will, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>, I will! Stand back and prepare to witness our moment of destiny!
A-Are you sure? Think of the crystals! Wouldn't you like to see all those shiny crystals!?
...As we suspected, there were crystals. A whole treasure trove of wealth. For you.

No doubt it will prove useful in your endless efforts of development, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>miss<Else/>sir</If>. I, however, must rethink the worth of my own fruitless ambitions. P-Please excuse me...
You're a visitor here, aren't you!? ...Tell me, what is your moral stance on smuggling someone off of an island? G-Generally speaking, of course!
